assessment.ADD_OCCUPATIONS: You can add occupations of your interest to Desired jobs in your Profile.
assessment.ADD_OCCUPATIONS_OF_INTERESTS: You can add occupations of your interest to Desired jobs in your Profile.
assessment.GOOD_LUCK: There are no right or wrong answers. Please take your time answering the questions. Good luck!

INTRODUCTION.DESCRIPTION_PART_1: The Vocational interest assessment can help you find out what your interests are and how they relate to the world of work. You can find out what you like to do.
INTRODUCTION.DESCRIPTION_PART_2: The Vocational interest assessment has 60 questions about work activities that some people do on their jobs.
INTRODUCTION.QUESTIONS: Read each question carefully and decide how you would feel about doing each type of work:
INTRODUCTION.TITLE: Get to know your vocational interests in 4 steps

assessment.JUST_THINK_ABOUT: Just think about if you would like or dislike doing the work.
assessment.NEXT_STEP_OCCUPATIONS: In the next step you will see occupations related to your interests.
assessment.NOT_THINK_FIRST: If you have enough education or training to do the work
assessment.NOT_THINK_SECOND: How much money you would make doing the work
assessment.OCCUPATIONS_OF_INTERESTS: In the next step you will see occupations related to your interests.
assessment.SELECT_JOB_PREPARATION_DESCRIPTION: How much education, training, and experience do you need to do the job? Different careers need different amounts of preparation. Select level of job preparation to help you identify and explore careers that might be right for you.

interests.ARTISTIC_DESCRIPTION: People with Artistic interests like work that deals with the artistic side of things, such as acting, music, art, and design. They like creativity in their work and work that can be done without following a set of rules.
interests.CONVENTIONAL_DESCRIPTION: People with Conventional interests like work that follows set procedures and routines. They prefer working with information and paying attention to details rather than working with ideas. They like working with clear rules and following a strong leader.
interests.ENTERPRISING_DESCRIPTION: People with Enterprising interests like work that has to do with starting up and carrying out business projects. These people prefer taking action rather than thinking about things. They like  persuading and leading people, making decisions and taking risks for profits.
interests.INVESTIGATIVE_DESCRIPTION: People with Investigative interests like work that has to do with ideas and thinking rather than physical activity or leading people. They like searching for facts and figuring out problems.
interests.REALISTIC_DESCRIPTION: People with Realistic interests like work that includes practical, hands-on problems and answers. Often people with Realistic interests do not like careers that involve paperwork or working closely with others. They like working with plants and animals, real-world materials like wood, tools, and machinery. They also like outside work.
interests.SOCIAL_DESCRIPTION: People with Social interests like working with others to help them learn and grow. They like working with people more than working with objects, machines, or information. They also like  teaching, giving advice, helping and being of service to people.

career-information.SELECT_ORIENTATION: Rate your current orientation with 1 (weakest) to 10 (highest)

career-path.DO_YOU_WANT_TO_KNOW: Do you want to know with which trainings you can improve your skills?
career-path.INTRO_TEXT: In My Career Path, you can find out what it takes to find a job in a certain occupation. We take competencies from your profile and compare them to what are common competencies required for an occupation. Below, you can select one of the desired jobs in your profile or enter any other job title. We will then show you what competencies you already have, and which are still missing.

First select the location. The list of caseworkers below depends on this location.

The designated caseworker can only be selected if you have chosen a location in the same state. The system will assign the caseworker if the selected location is from a different state.
